name: Happy Place (Key)
description:
Welcome to the Happy Rooms, you can explore this place and find friendly folks, start conversations, and maybe just maybe find cake somewhere inside the Happy Rooms, remember, the only place to be safe is here, your HAPPY PLACE.

If you confront... i mean... meet a Happy People, they may want to talk with you, just use your MOUSE and choose wisely your words,  remember to respond their words with nice comebacks, timing is key, you can recibe experience every time if you can survive... this nice conversations!

Key Elements:

- Turn Base RPG with a little twist...

- Huge map to explore, with different patterns and enemies... i mean... Happy People!

- And more!

This game  was created for the Game Jam+ 2022

 by:

Daniel Somarribas

Steven Quirós

Sergio Fernández

Laura Sánchez
